name: swarm

effect.diamond-pearl: Increases the frequency of cries heard on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.
effect.platinum: Increases the frequency of cries heard on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.
effect.heartgold-soulsilver: Increases the frequency of cries heard on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.

short_effect: Strengthens bug moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.
flavor_text.platinum: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.
